articles.author: April Rubin
articles.title: Most oppose Trump's military strikes against alleged drug boats: poll - Axios
articles.description: Just 29% of Americans said they supported the military strikes without judicial process.
articles.content:
By the numbers: 29% of Americans said they supported the military killings without the involvement of a judge or court.
  • A majority (51%) said they were opposed. The rest were unsure.
